page.title: 05PORTALS ENGINEERING
page.content: One of the major{employers}in Dovercourt{industry}is Portals engineering.We were able to pay them a visit and to have the chance to discover just what it is they do there. Mr. Good, the manager of the factory answered our questions. He told us that the company made large number of machines which are able to{print {labels}for a whole range of products, and then to take the bottles, tins, or whatever,and to stick the labels on.It was amazing to see the many different types that they have,and also interesting to notice how many of the labels have{bar codes}put on them.These will be read by other machines to keep a check on stock and prices.It seems strange to think that machines made here are{exported}to 52 different countries around the world.
